title: OpenRemote shared json schema
description: JSON schema for a device that can be controlled by the OpenRemote system.

hex8Regex.description: A regex for matching a hexadecimal byte value.

hex16Regex.description: A regex for matching a hexadecimal word value.

hex24Regex.description: A regex for matching a 24-bit hexadecimal value.

hex32Regex.description: A regex for matching a hexadecimal dword value.

hex24PosNum.description: A positive hexadecimal 24-bit value expressed as either an integer or a string in hex format.

hex32PosNum.description: A positive hexadecimal dword value expressed as either an integer or a string in hex format.
